content.rendered:
You probably thought you knew all about the lives of famous people – be it Mother Teresa, Marilyn Monroe, Winston Churchill, Abraham Lincoln or other popular personalities. But in The Book of Amazing Stories you’ll find out so much more about Marilyn’s never ending search for love and Winston’s disastrous military career. You’ll marvel at how the events in the lives of many ordinary as well as well-known people changed the course of human history.

Stories have the capacity to touch something deep within us. They have the power to inspire, to transform. In this book, popular speaker, storyteller and author Robert Petterson compiles 90 incredible real-life stories that teach lessons you won’t easily forget. Each story ends with a thought-provoking principle. In these stories, you will discover that there are no little people or small places.

BE AMAZED • BE ENCOURAGED • BE INSPIRED
